Nick's Blog

Christmas 2006 (continued)

30 December 2006

Roxanna came over to visit for a while so I gave the courtesy of putting my computer down while she was here. We went to Sushi Tomi and then came back to hang out a bit had watched some more ER. The past few episodes have been really good and I feel that I have been completely sucked in. Before we went out for dinner we were at the starbucks on Shorline catching up.

I don't have any set plans for tonight. Yesterday while we were at the mall I picked up the book The God Delusion by Richard Dawkins as recommended by Eric a few months back. I'm really interested in finally reading it.

Tomorrow morning we are going to a family christmas party around lunch. I don't know about plans for the rest of the day. I've never been crazy into New Year's eve parties or celebration.
